gen:link.msg:message: De datum gerapporteerd voor `DocumentAdoptionDate` BEHOORT te liggen voor, of gelijk zijn aan, de huidige datum. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtDateEarlierThanEQDateCurrent1_DocumentAdoptionDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtDateEarlierThanEQDateCurrent1_DocumentAdoptionDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

De datum gerapporteerd voor `FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate` BEHOORT te liggen voor de huidige datum. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtDateEarlierThanCurrent1_FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtDateEarlierThanCurrent1_FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

De datum gerapporteerd voor `FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate` MOET liggen voor de datum gerapporteerd voor `DocumentAdoptionDate`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater2_FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater2_FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater2_DocumentAdoptionDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater2_DocumentAdoptionDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

De datum gerapporteerd voor `FinancialStatementsDateOfPreparation` BEHOORT te liggen voor, of gelijk zijn aan, de datum gerapporteerd voor `DocumentAdoptionDate`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtDateEarlierEQDateLater1_FinancialStatementsDateOfPreparation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtDateEarlierEQDateLater1_FinancialStatementsDateOfPreparation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtDateEarlierEQDateLater1_DocumentAdoptionDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtDateEarlierEQDateLater1_DocumentAdoptionDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

De gerapporteerde waarde MOET gebruikt worden met measure pure. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_AllMeasureEqualToPure1_AllPureConcepts')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_AllMeasureEqualToPure1_AllPureConcepts return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

De gerapporteerde waarde MOET gebruikt worden met measure shares. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_AllMeasureEqualToShares1_AllSharesConcepts')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_AllMeasureEqualToShares1_AllSharesConcepts return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

De gerapporteerde waarde van `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` MOET NIET `Geconsolideerd` zijn. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueNE1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueNE1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults` BEHOORT minimaal één keer voor te komen met `SeparateMember` en minimaal één keer met `ConsolidatedMember`, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` gelijk is aan `Geconsolideerd en enkelvoudig`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnFST2AndFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnFST2AndFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnFST2AndFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResultsFST1')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnFST2AndFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResultsFST1 return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnFST2AndFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResultsFST2')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnFST2AndFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResultsFST2 return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults` BEHOORT minimaal één keer voor te komen met `SeparateMember`, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` gelijk is aan `Enkelvoudig`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults` met `ConsolidatedMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan `BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults` met `SeparateMember`, omdat `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` gelijk is aan `Geconsolideerd en enkelvoudig`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueCovDPUThnFST1EQFactFST21_Set00DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueCovDPUThnFST1EQFactFST21_Set00DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueCovDPUThnFST1EQFactFST21_Set01BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueCovDPUThnFST1EQFactFST21_Set01BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueCovDPUThnFST1EQFactFST21_Set02BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueCovDPUThnFST1EQFactFST21_Set02BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DocumentAdoptionDate` MOET NIET gerapporteerd worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `DocumentAdoptionStatus` gelijk is aan `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_DocumentAdoptionStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_DocumentAdoptionStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_DocumentAdoptionDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_DocumentAdoptionDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DocumentAdoptionDate` MOET minimaal één keer voorkomen, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `DocumentAdoptionStatus` gelijk is aan `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnExistence5_DocumentAdoptionStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnExistence5_DocumentAdoptionStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
